query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_installers,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active,
  COUNT(DISTINCT state) as states_covered
FROM installers

  SUM(CASE WHEN isVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active,
